item.title: Evaluation of Recommender Algorithms in Surprise on Yelp Ratings
Customizing Bar Plots in Matplotlib
item.description: Bar charts are good to visualize grouped data values with counts. In this post, we will see how to customize the default plot theme of matplotlib.pyplot to our personal aesthetics and design choices.
